name: Virtual Pet Lance
description:
Woo my first real finished game thing, enjoy and thanks for playing!

 This is your health; it will get duller in color until you die.

 This is food, click on it to increase health by eating.

This is a ball, click on it to increase health by playing.

This is soap, click on it to increase health by bathing.

-----

Character is Lance on Toyhouse
